 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַר‎</span> **verb** ==be black== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחוֺר‎</span> and derivatives, ***black, blackness***, etc., [[Eccl.25.17|Eccl 25:17]] Hiph\`il ***make black***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁחַר‎</span> ([[BDB#Jastr|Jastrow]] [[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]), Aph\`el ***grow black***, so <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***coal***; Jäger<sup>BAS ii. 295</sup> compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šûru***</u></abbr>, ***coal***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šurinnu***</u></abbr>, ***fire-pot***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, of skin [[Job.30.30|Job 30:30]].
